title: Beef satay with ginger dipping sauce
ingredients: ['350g (12oz) sirloin steak, cut 2.5cm (1in) thick, trimmed of all excess fat', '3 large yellow or red peppers, each cut into 8 triangles', '4 spring onions, cut into 7.5cm (3in) pieces', 'For the dipping sauce', '125ml (4floz) rice vinegar', '55g (2oz) finely chopped red pepper', '2 tbsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp finely chopped shallot', '1½ tsp grated fresh root ginger', '1–1½ tsp chilli-garlic sauce', '½ tsp grated lemon zest']
